channel.title: Pages on The Blog of Cherganski
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on The Blog of Cherganski

item.title: About
item.description: About Hi! I am Aleksandar Cherganski and this is my personal blog about anything I find interest and have the urge to share with other people. Throughout high school I participated in many mathematical competition (such as the International Mathematical Olympiad) and I can proudly say that by heart I am a mathematician. In university I steered towards the more applied subject of Computer Science with a focus on Machine Learning.
